summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2230, for the improvement of the alley between Eastlake Avenue and Melrose Avenue, from East Denny Way to East Thomas Street, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 22777 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
